casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Lawrence E. MONTAGUE. No. 361P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2004. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of July 2004 by Defendant for Relief:

"Motion dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of August 2004."
